Ad Text:
DLA Piper is seeking a skilled and forward-thinking Reliability Engineer to join a growing international team. This is a unique opportunity to work at the intersection of software engineering, DevOps, and infrastructure reliability. Supporting large-scale distributed systems across the Aisa-Pacific regions, Europe, the UK, the Middle East and Africa.

Collaborating closely with colleagues in EMEA, you will be responsible for ensuring high availability, performance, and scalability of our systems. You will work closely with the Platform and Product teams to automate infrastructure, streamline CI/CD processes, and proactively monitor system health.

Maid duties and responsibilities

Design and implement automation across infrastructure and applications

Monitor system performance and reliability, responding to alerts and incidents

Collaborate on system design, capacity planning, and platform management

Build sustainable systems through automation and uplift initiatives

Drive improvements in operational processes and team practices

Lead fault detection, remediation, and performance tuning

About you

Proficiency in programming languages (Python, Java, C++, Ruby, JavaScript)

Experience with cloud infrastructure and distributed storage (e.g., NFS, HDFS, Ceph)

Familiarity with resource management frameworks (e.g., Kubernetes, Apache Mesos)

Strong troubleshooting skills and a proactive approach to performance optimisation

Experience with CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure automation, and incident response

Ability to influence and collaborate across teams and senior stakeholders
